publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2036# Dr Jean Turner: Help to Stub Out Smoking—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by the Scottish Executive proposing to end smoking in enclosed public places; notes the cross-party support for measures to tackle this issue; further notes the scientific consensus on the damage that tobacco smoke does to human health, and considers that the Executive should maintain its commitment to the comprehensive ban, recognise that smoking is an addiction and make an ongoing financial commitment in order that this addiction can be controlled on an continuing basis. Supported by: John Swinburne*, Eleanor Scott*, Rob Gibson*, Jackie Baillie*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Chris Ballance*, Brian Adam*, Mike Pringle*

S2M-2036# Dr Jean Turner: Help to Stub Out Smoking—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by the Scottish Executive proposing to end smoking in enclosed public places; notes the cross-party support for measures to tackle this issue; further notes the scientific consensus on the damage that tobacco smoke does to human health, and considers that the Executive should maintain its commitment to the comprehensive ban, recognise that smoking is an addiction and make an ongoing financial commitment in order that this addiction can be controlled on an continuing basis. Supported by: John Swinburne, Eleanor Scott, Rob Gibson, Jackie Baillie, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Chris Ballance, Brian Adam, Mike Pringle, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Tommy Sheridan*, Alex Neil*, Bristow Muldoon*
